name: HoneyQuest
description: Welcome to Hoey Quest! You are a Grizzly Bear with a gun trying to get back your cave from alien Bees to have taken over the forest. You found out that if you were to kill the queen bee then of the minions will die too. So you grabbed your gun and jumped in, only to be faced my millitary bees, honey Monsters and lots and lots of traps. You find out you cant do this on your own , so with the help of your community you upgraded your weapond and gathered gizmos in order to defeat the Queen Bee. This Demo it to show off  the basic gameplay and for me to know what to fix as well as what i can add to make the game more fun and exiting there is no end or boss in this version so please feel free to lets your impressions of the game be known. Thankyou for playing my game:).
